0: A string of church arsons in East Texas has congregations mobilizing to guard their houses of worship, while investigators dig through charred buildings for evidence. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Authorities are examining 10 fires in the area this year, seven pf which have been ruled arsons, according to Tom Crowley, a spokesman from the federal Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms and Explosives.
